attributes.background: Cannabis should be legal as I believe If it was legalised we could cut down on crime rate. Not only that, but cannabis has many health benefits such as; prevent and treat GI disorders such as irritable bowel syndrome , inflammatory bowel disease , Crohn's, ulcerative colitis and more

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Legalise cannabis and expunge previous convictions for possession:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638253
